spec_data.Name: authconfig
spec_data.Description:
Authconfig is a command line utility which can configure a workstation
to use shadow (more secure) passwords.  Authconfig can also configure a
system to be a client for certain networked user information and
authentication schemes.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 06 Aug 2017 11:30:56 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Command line tool for setting up authentication from network services
